pkgmetadata.longdescription: Client for Web Time-Series Service // Allows remote access to satellite image time series provided by the web time series service (WTSS) available at servers such as https://brazildatacube.dpi.inpe.br/wtss/. The functions include listing the data sets available in WTSS servers, describing the contents of a data set, and retrieving a time series based on spatial location and temporal filters.
